content: st increase in next st repeat around ● slip_stitch to join ● fo and leave a tail for attaching 15 ✏ t ● chain 9 single_crochet in second chain from hook and across 8 sts ● chain 4 single_crochet in second chain from hook and in next 2 chain ● slip_stitch into the same stitch space where you began the chain 4 ● slip_stitch to the other side of the same end ● repeat from chain 4 to slip_stitch ● fo and leave a tail for attaching ✏ i ● chain 9 single_crochet in second chain from hook and across 8 sts ● chain 4 single_crochet in second chain from hook and in next 2 chain ● slip_stitch into same stitch space as chain 4 ● slip_stitch to the other side of the same end ● repeat the chain 4 to slip_stitch sequence ● slip_stitch down to the other end and repeat from chain 4 on both sides ● fo and leave a tail for attaching ✏ m ● chain 24 ● single_crochet in next 7 sts ● work 3 single_crochet in the same st first hump 16 ● single_crochet in next 2 sts ● decrease over 3 sts see special instructions below ● single_crochet in next 2 sts ● work 3 single_crochet in same st second hump ● single_crochet in remaining 7 sts ● fo and leave a tail for attaching 🪡 special stitch 3-stitch decrease picture guide in the above stitch section ● insert hook into first st yo pull up a loop 2 loops on hook ● skip next st insert hook into third st yo pull up a loop 3 loops on hook ● yo pull through all 3 loops don t worry if the m looks a bit unruly it comes together when shaped and stitched onto your background ✏ f make 2 ● chain 9 single_crochet in second chain from hook and across 8 sts ● chain 3 single_crochet in second chain and next chain ● slip_stitch into the same stitch space as the chain 3 ● slip_stitch in next 2 sts ● repeat the chain 3/single_crochet 2/slip_stitch one more time ● fo and leave a tail for attaching ✏ e make 3 17 ● chain 9 single_crochet in second chain from hook and across 8 sts ● chain 3 single_crochet in second chain and next chain ● slip_stitch into same stitch space as chain 3 ● slip_stitch in next 3 sts ● repeat chain 3/single_crochet 2/slip_stitch ● slip_stitch in next 4 sts ● repeat chain 3/single_crochet 2/slip_stitch again ● fo and leave a tail for attaching 🧷 attachment use the running stitch and your yarn tail to sew down each letter ● stitch around the entire outer edge of each letter ● for the o be sure to also stitch around the inner circle to secure it smoothly 18 ⬜ background with color a off white 📐 panel ● row 1 chain 42 double_crochet in third chain from hook and in each chain
